headline: Does Mosaic (MOS) Offer Value After Recent Commodity Sentiment Shift?
summary: If you are wondering whether Mosaic's current share price lines up with its underlying value, this article will walk through what the numbers are saying in a clear and practical way. Mosaic's share price recently closed at US$25.30, with returns of 5.0% over the last 7 days, 7.0% over the last 30 days, 1.1% year to date, 5.7% over the last year, a 39.0% decline over the last 3 years, and flat returns over 5 years. Recent coverage around Mosaic has focused on how investors are reassessing...

headline: The Mosaic Company (MOS) Divests Potash Operation in New Mexico for $30M to Focus on Canada Operations
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is one of the best fertilizer stocks to invest in. On December 22, The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) entered into a definitive agreement to sell Mosaic Potash Carlsbad to International Minerals Carlsbad for $30 million. The sale covers the operations, assets, and liabilities of the Mosaic mine in Carlsbad, New Mexico. Under […]
